headline: Everest Group Announces Dividend
summary: HAMILTON, Bermuda, February 27, 2025--Everest Group, Ltd. announced that its Board of Directors declared a dividend of $2.00 per common share. This dividend will be payable on or before March 28, 2025 to all shareholders of record as of March 17, 2025.

headline: Davis Financial Fund 2025 Annual Review
summary: Since its inception in 1991, Davis Financial Fund has invested in durable, well-managed financial services companies at value prices, which the fund could hold for the long term.
